name: Think (OMOEXPERIENCES)
description:
What is this?

This is Think. A game that is hard to explain. I have been sitting here for a while now thinking of a description to write for this game since I can't even think of any way how I can explain it. How do I describe this game?

What is the meaning?

I can't even of think of that. Patience might be key to finding that out, at-least your own meaning.
